subject: I Am Kelvin Barry from Turke
body:
I Am Kelvin Barry from Turkey, work with the N P O G C ( National Petroleum Oil And Gas corporation) and I have total of $3,000,000.00 ( UNITED STATE DOLLARS THREE MILLION DOLLARS ) that is still outstanding since 2015 and all necessary confirmations has been made by my committee and we have decided to search for another person that will assist us so that we can agree with the person to enable us pay the sum of $3,000,000.00 ( UNITED STATE DOLLARS THREE MILLION DOLLARS ) to his or her account or any Bank Account he will provide to us.Hence our Contact to you.
As a matter of fact, there is no atom of risk involved in this payment exercise. If you are interested to receive this funds, please indicate by
responding to this mail.( 
kelvin_barry22@yahoo.com
 )
Our committee has agreed to share this $3,000,000.00 ( UNITED STATE DOLLARS THREE MILLION DOLLARS  ) with you at the ratio of 60:40. 60% for us and 40% for you as our foreign partner.
If you have any questions to ask, please feel free to do so.
Thanks for your anticipated cooperation,
Yours Sincerely,
Dr  Kelvin Barry

subject: Re:   I Am Kelvin Barry from Turke
body:
Hello Kelvin Barry, thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I am interested in learning more about how I can assist with the transfer of the funds. Could you please provide me with more details on the process and what would be required from my end?

Best wishes,
Lorraine

subject: Re:   I Am Kelvin Barry from Turke
Re:   I Am Kelvin Barry from Turke
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information. Could you please provide more details about why this information is needed and how it will be used? I want to make sure everything is clear before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Lorraine
